en_us: Ruin 8000 blocks to coarse dirt; you'll find those oak planks
Ruin 10000 blocks to coarse dirt; how about a little more?
Creates natural looking trodden paths in high traffic areas, but be careful not to ruin your neighbour's lawn!
Celaro negates desire lines and causes invisibility when sneaking in shrubbery.
The Celaro Shamir is found on Aluminium Bands. It can be placed onto boots.\n\nDesire Lines will not activate while wearing these boots.
Sneaking in double-tall shrubbery (e.g. Tall Grass, Large Fern, Peony) with celaro will grant invisibility.
Creates natural looking trodden paths in high traffic areas, but be careful not to ruin your neighbour's lawn!
Walking or sprinting over grass and dirt will trample blocks.\n\nGrass blocks will trample into dirt and dirt into coarse dirt.
Foliage such as flowers, mushrooms, grass, and snow layers can also be destroyed via desire lines.
Foliage such as flowers, mushrooms, grass, and snow layers can also be destroyed via desire lines.\n\nThe Boots of Ostara can prevent desire lines.
Foliage such as flowers, mushrooms, grass, and snow layers can also be destroyed via desire lines.\n\nBoots with the Celaro Shamir can prevent desire lines
Foliage such as flowers, mushrooms, grass, and snow layers can also be destroyed via desire lines.\n\nBoots with the Celaro Shamir, or normal Boots of Ostara can prevent desire lines.
